verses.verse: Praise<WH1984> Yahweh!<WH3050> Sing<WH7891> to Yahweh<WH3050> a new<WH2319> song,<WH7892> his praise<WH8416> in the assembly<WH6951> of the saints.<WH2623>
Let Israel<WH3478> rejoice<WH8055> in him who made<WH6213> them.<WH1121> Let the children of Zion<WH6726> be joyful<WH1523> in their King.<WH4428>
Let them praise<WH1984> his name<WH8034> in the dance!<WH4234> Let them sing praises<WH2167> to him with tambourine<WH8596> and harp!<WH3658>
For Yahweh<WH3068> takes pleasure<WH7521> in his people.<WH5971> He crowns<WH6286> the humble<WH6035> with salvation.<WH3444>
Let the saints<WH2623> rejoice in honor.<WH3519> Let them sing for joy<WH7442> on their beds.<WH4904>
May the high<WH7319> praises of God<WH410> be in their mouths,<WH1627> and a two-edged<WH6374> sword<WH2719> in their hand;<WH3027>
To execute<WH6213> vengeance<WH5360> on the nations,<WH1471> and punishments<WH8433> on the peoples;<WH3816>
To bind<WH631> their kings<WH4428> with chains,<WH2131> and their nobles<WH3513> with fetters<WH3525> of iron;<WH1270>
to execute<WH6213> on them the written<WH3789> judgment.<WH4941> All his saints<WH2623> have this honor.<WH1926> Praise<WH1984> Yah!<WH3050>
